The ingredients are cooked until golden brown and slightly crispy, creating a delicious and hearty meal.	<>	The hot dog features a toasted bun, shredded meat, melted cheese, and a fried egg, cooked by grilling or toasting, with a golden-brown exterior and slightly crispy edges, showcasing a savory and hearty combination.	<>	The hot dog is a crispy bread bun filled with shredded meat, melted cheese, and a sunny-side-up egg, cooked in a skillet until the egg is golden and the bread is toasted.
